name: HomeMade Preserve Gift Labels PDF Printable
description:
** VIsit wellpreserved.ca and sign up for our newsletter. for the next 2 newsletters there will be a discount code to get this item FREE! **

Gifting your homemade preserves or anything homemade that goes in a mason jar?? Download this page of printables. 

It's setup in letter sized (8.5 x 11) format.

A good heavy paper is recommended (whatever will go through your printer). Print it on coloured paper to put your unique spin on it. Then just cut them out with a good sharp pair of scissors. 

You'll need 
- a single hole punch
- good pair of scissors
- some ribbon to tie the tags
- colourful printer paper, heavy stock if possible

Included on the sheet:
2x wide mouth mason jar lid liners *place under screw cap
2x standard mouth mason jar lid liners *place under screw cap
2x 1.25" round tags 
2x rectangular mitred edge tags

All downloads from the wellpreserved store are powered by an automatic delivery service. Download links will be sent to the email address linked with your Paypal account. If you aren't using Paypal to checkout, please fill in your address when prompted.

There may be a small delay between payment and delivery, and be sure to double check spam and junk folders.

name: The Periodic Table of Waterbath Preserving ~ Poster
description: Poster Version! These were printed up on 100% Recycled by the awesome people at Warren's Waterless Printing. www.warrenswaterless.com The WellPreserved Periodic Table of Waterbath Preserving was first published as a centrefold (!) in the Edible Toronto Spring 2011 Issue. This poster will make your kitchen or pantry or survival bunker way more stylish and inspiring. The image area is 11 x 14 plus .25” white border. **TOO LATE FOR CHRISTMAS 2 for 1 SALE ** Okay it's too late to get these out by christmas but if you're looking for a spring gift and something for yourself to remind you that spring is indeed coming and there will be loads of preserving to do.... LIMITED TIME - UNTIL DECEMBER 20...when you order 1 poster...i'll stick 2 in the box...order 2, i'll stick 4 in the box! (that's the max or they get all bent up). I'll ship them out first week of January so they'll be in time for the next big holiday. Valentines day! yay february. Price Includes Shipping. Poster will be shipped rolled in a protective tube. Multiple orders will ship together. Click here to see the rest of our posters and prints.

name: The Periodic Table of Waterbath Preserving ~ Archival Print
description: The WellPreserved Periodic Table of Waterbath Preserving was first published as a centrefold (!) in the Edible Toronto Spring 2011 Issue. This poster will make your kitchen or pantry or survival bunker way more stylish and inspiring. Printed with archival inks on 100% cotton rag 220 gsm, museum grade fine art paper. No optical brightening agents and Acid free... so the colours will not fade if you hang it in a sunny spot and it’ll last until well after the zombie apocalypse in your bunker or pantry. The image area is 11 x 14 plus .25” white border. Price Includes Shipping. Poster will be shipped rolled in a protective tube. *contact us if you are interested in wholesale pricing or larger orders wearewellpreserved (at) elevenideas (dot) ca Click here to see the rest of our posters and prints.

name: Sustainable Fish Switch ~ Archival Print
description:
Originally printed in the Edible Toronto Summer 2012 Issue, we're hoping this can serve as an attractive reference to make some more sustainable choices when you want fish for dinner. We're big fans of the Ocean Wise if you want a comprehensive listing:
http://www.oceanwise.ca/seafood

Printed with archival inks on 100% cotton rag 220 gsm, museum grade fine art paper. No optical brightening agents and Acid free...
so the colours will not fade if you hang it in a sunny spot.

The image area is 11 x 14 plus .25” white border.

Price Includes Shipping.
Poster will be shipped rolled in a protective tube.
